channel.title: 5. Fake it til you Bake it :: She Codes One Day Workshop Tutorials (new)
channel.description: Setting Up We’ve got a website up and working - woohoo! We’ve got a few settings to play with, and then we can get some content loaded in. After creating an application, we need to tell Django that it should use it. We do that in the file bakery_project/settings.py, open it in your code editor. We need to find INSTALLED_APPS and add a line containing your app just above ]. So the final product should look like this:
